text: Kim Clijsters was the defending champion, and successfully defended her 2009 title, after she won 6–2, 6–1, against Vera Zvonareva in the final. ==Seeds== # Caroline Wozniacki (Semifinals) # Kim Clijsters (Champion) # Venus Williams (Semifinals) # Jelena Janković (Third Round) # Samantha Stosur (Quarterfinals) # Francesca Schiavone (Quarterfinals) # Vera Zvonareva (Final) # Li Na (First Round) # Agnieszka Radwańska (Second Round) # Victoria Azarenka (Second Round, retired due to concussion) # Svetlana Kuznetsova (Fourth Round) # Elena Dementieva (Fourth Round) # Marion Bartoli (Second Round) # Maria Sharapova (Fourth Round) # Yanina Wickmayer (Fourth Round) # Shahar Pe'er (Fourth Round) 17. Nadia Petrova (First Round) 18. Aravane Rezaï (Second Round) 19. Flavia Pennetta (Third Round) 20. Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova (Fourth Round) 21. Zheng Jie (Second Round) 22. María José Martínez Sánchez (Second Round) 23. Maria Kirilenko (Third Round) 24. Daniela Hantuchová (Third Round) 25. Alexandra Dulgheru (Third Round) 26. Lucie Šafářová (First Round) 27. Petra Kvitová (Third Round) 28. Alisa Kleybanova (Second Round) 29. Alona Bondarenko (Third Round) 30. Yaroslava Shvedova (First Round) 31. Kaia Kanepi (Quarterfinals) 32.
